Key Match Events: A spilled drink caused a 7-minute delay in the third quarter
Christian Braun tied the game with a three-pointer at 93-93
Sam Hauser's challenge led to a key defensive play by the Celtics
Post-Match Reflections: The Nuggets dropped to 10-7 at home
The Celtics improved their record with the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was between the last two NBA champions
The Nuggets were missing Aaron Gordon due to a calf injury
